description: This package will install the chocolatey package windows-adk (if not already installed), and then add the path of oscdimg.exe to %PATH%.
displayName: Oscdimg.exe of Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit in PATH
summary: By default, after installing the Windows ADK, oscdimg is not in PATH. For instance, a tool like Hashicorp's Packer requires oscdimg.exe to be in path to function. This package finds the path to oscdimg.exe, and adds that path to %PATH% machine variable
author: Microsoft
